H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H5265.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from another object into which it had been inserted or attached in a different way

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H1237.def: = a more or less flat and relatively low region, usually between uplands, hills or mountains, and following the course of a stream

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H3051.def: = causative action by which humans transfer the possession of an object to someone else

H3835.def: literally: to become white; hence: = process by which branches become light in color because they are stripped of their bark

H3843.def: = block made of clay in a mold and either dried in the sun or hardened in an oven; ► used as a building material, especially in places where stone or wood was scarce

H8313.def: = process by which an object is consumed by fire

H8316.def: = process by which objects are consumed by fire

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H2564.def: = tarlike substance; ◄ naturally derived from petroleum; ► used in certain areas for binding together stones or bricks; also used to make objects watertight

H2563.def: = stiff tenacious earth; ► material of which bricks, pottery, and even man himself is made; ≈ buildings made with this material are regarded as relatively weak as opposed to buildings made of stone; therefore it is also seen as relatively worthless material

H3051.def: = causative action by which humans transfer the possession of an object to someone else

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H4026.def: = relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H87.def: = man, also known as {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H3876.def: = piece of cloth ► used to cover a corpse before burial; ≈ associated with death and sorrow

H2039.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>} and brother of {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>} and {L:Nahor<SDBH:נָחֹור>}; ► father of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>}

H8297.def: = woman, also known as {L:Sarah<SDBH:שָׂרָה>}; ► wife of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>} and mother of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3778.def: exact meaning unknown; = class of persons skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3667.def: = man; ◄ youngest son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Canaanites<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H2771.def: = town; ◄ in northern Mesopotamia; ► place where {L:Abraham's<SDBH:אַבְרָם>} father settled when coming from {L:Ur<SDBH:אוּר>} and where his relatives continued to live; later destroyed by {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}; trading partner of {L:Tyre<SDBH:צֹר>}

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H8646.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Nahor<SDBH:נָחֹור>}; descendant of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► father of {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}, {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H2771.def: = town; ◄ in northern Mesopotamia; ► place where {L:Abraham's<SDBH:אַבְרָם>} father settled when coming from {L:Ur<SDBH:אוּר>} and where his relatives continued to live; later destroyed by {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}; trading partner of {L:Tyre<SDBH:צֹר>}
